p: The release profiles of Res powder drug and Res SMEDDS at different pH values were shown in Fig 6. The release percentage of Res from Res SMEDDS was more than 80% within 10 minutes, whereas the highest release percentage of Res powder drug was less than 55% within 60 minutes at the three different pH values. Statistically significant differences were observed between the two formulations at the same pH (P<0. 05). The free energy required to form microemulsion is very low, spontaneous formation of microemulsion accelerate the dissolution of drug. In addition, smaller droplet size and larger interfacial area also advantageously increase the drug release rate[ 36], therefore, Res SMEDDS was able to enhance the in vitro release of Res.
